CmdLine: set -ex   && apk add --no-cache curl build-base bash   && curl -Lo dumb-init.tgz "https://github.com/Yelp/dumb-init/archive/v${DUMB_INIT_VERSION}.tar.gz"   && tar xzf dumb-init.tgz   && cd dumb-init-${DUMB_INIT_VERSION}   && make   && cp dumb-init /usr/bin   && cd ..   && rm -rf dumb-init*   && apk del curl build-base bash
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -ex   && apk add --no-cache curl   && curl -Lo sigil.tgz "https://github.com/gliderlabs/sigil/releases/download/v${SIGIL_VERSION}/sigil_${SIGIL_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tgz"   && tar xzf sigil.tgz -C /usr/local/bin   && rm sigil.tgz   && apk del curl
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -ex   && apk add --no-cache curl   && curl -Lo filebeat.tgz "https://download.elastic.co/beats/filebeat/filebeat-${FILEBEAT_VERSION}-x86_64.tar.gz"   && echo "${FILEBEAT_SHA1}  filebeat.tgz" | sha1sum -c -   && tar xzf filebeat.tgz   && cp filebeat-*/filebeat /usr/local/bin   && rm -rf filebeat*   && apk del curl
Commands.Name: run
